criteria: Understanding of Relevant Laws: Assesses the student's comprehension of the legal statutes concerning sexual involvement with minors, including variations in age of consent and the implications of statutory rape.
Analysis of Legal Ramifications: Evaluates the student's ability to analyze the legal consequences and penalties associated with violating laws related to sexual involvement with minors.

Application to Real-World Scenarios: Assesses the student's ability to apply their knowledge of the laws to hypothetical or real-world scenarios, demonstrating an understanding of how the laws function in practice.
